description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for player-related API endpoints, including fetching stats, updating location, and retrieving activity logs. It utilizes middleware for authentication and validation, and interacts with external utility modules.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Middleware helper that validates request input and returns errors if validation fails.

methods.name: GET /api/player/stats
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve current player stats, requires authentication.

methods.name: POST /api/player/location
methods.description: Endpoint to update player's geographic location, requires validation and authentication.

methods.name: GET /api/player/activity
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve player's activity log, with optional limit parameter.

calls: callRPC('update_user_location', { p_user_id: userId, p_lat: parseFloat(lat), p_lon: parseFloat(lon) })
